verses.verse: הַדָּבָר֙ <S%H1697><s%> had-da-Var The word אֲשֶׁ֣ר <S%H834><s%> 'a-Sher which הָיָ֣ה <S%H1961><s%> ha-Yah came אֶֽל־ <S%H413><s%> 'el- to יִרְמְיָ֔הוּ <S%H3414><s%> yir-me-Ya-hu, which came to Jeremiah מֵאֵ֥ת <S%H853><s%> me-'Et יְהוָ֖ה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh from the LORD לֵאמֹֽר׃ <S%H559><s%> le-Mor. saying

ק֥וּם <S%H6965><s%> kum Arise וְיָרַדְתָּ֖ <S%H3381><s%> ve-ya-rad-Ta and go down בֵּ֣ית <S%H1004><s%> beit house הַיּוֹצֵ֑ר <S%H3335><s%> hai-yo-Tzer; to the potter's וְשָׁ֖מָּה <S%H8033><s%> ve-Sham-mah and there אַשְׁמִֽיעֲךָ֥ <S%H8085><s%> 'ash-mi-'a-Cha and there I will cause thee to hear אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- דְּבָרָֽי׃ <S%H1697><s%> de-va-Rai. my words

וָאֵרֵ֖ד <S%H3381><s%> va-'e-Red Then I went down בֵּ֣ית <S%H1004><s%> beit house הַיּוֹצֵ֑ר <S%H3335><s%> hai-yo-Tzer; to the potter's; וְהִנֵּהוּ ve-hin-ne-hu כוְהִנֵּה־ ve-hin-neh- ה֛וּא <S%H2009><s%> hu behold קעֹשֶׂ֥ה <S%H6213><s%> 'o-Seh he wrought מְלָאכָ֖ה <S%H4399><s%> me-la-Chah a work עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> 'al- on הָאָבְנָֽיִם׃ <S%H70><s%> ha-'a-ve-Na-yim. on the wheels

וְנִשְׁחַ֣ת <S%H7843><s%> ve-nish-Chat was marred הַכְּלִ֗י <S%H3627><s%> hak-ke-Li, And the vessel אֲשֶׁ֨ר <S%H834><s%> 'a-Sher after ה֥וּא <S%H1931><s%> hu he עֹשֶׂ֛ה <S%H6213><s%> 'o-Seh that he made בַּחֹ֖מֶר <S%H2563><s%> ba-Cho-mer of clay בְּיַ֣ד <S%H3027><s%> be-Yad in the hand הַיּוֹצֵ֑ר <S%H3335><s%> hai-yo-Tzer; of the potter וְשָׁ֗ב <S%H7725><s%> ve-Shav, it again וַֽיַּעֲשֵׂ֙הוּ֙ <S%H6213><s%> vai-ya-'a-Se-hu so he made כְּלִ֣י <S%H3627><s%> ke-Li vessel אַחֵ֔ר <S%H312><s%> 'a-Cher, another כַּאֲשֶׁ֥ר <S%H834><s%> ka-'a-Sher after יָשַׁ֛ר <S%H3474><s%> ya-Shar good בְּעֵינֵ֥י <S%H5869><s%> be-'ei-Nei as seemed הַיּוֹצֵ֖ר <S%H3335><s%> hai-yo-Tzer to the potter לַעֲשֽׂוֹת׃ <S%H6213><s%> la-'a-Sot. to make פ Peh

וַיְהִ֥י <S%H1961><s%> vay-Hi came דְבַר־ <S%H1697><s%> de-var- Then the word יְהוָ֖ה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh of the LORD אֵלַ֥י <S%H413><s%> 'e-Lai to me לֵאמֽוֹר׃ <S%H559><s%> le-Mor. came to me saying

הֲכַיּוֹצֵ֨ר <S%H3335><s%> ha-chai-yo-Tzer with you as this potter הַזֶּ֜ה <S%H2088><s%> haz-Zeh this לֹא־ <S%H3808><s%> lo- not אוּכַ֨ל <S%H3201><s%> 'u-Chal cannot לַעֲשׂ֥וֹת <S%H6213><s%> la-'a-Sot I do לָכֶ֛ם la-Chem בֵּ֥ית <S%H1004><s%> beit O house יִשְׂרָאֵ֖ל <S%H3478><s%> Yis-ra-'El of Israel נְאֻם־ <S%H5002><s%> ne-'um- ;saith יְהוָ֑ה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh; the LORD הִנֵּ֤ה <S%H2009><s%> hin-Neh Behold כַחֹ֙מֶר֙ <S%H2563><s%> cha-Cho-mer Behold as the clay בְּיַ֣ד <S%H3027><s%> be-Yad hand הַיּוֹצֵ֔ר <S%H3335><s%> hai-yo-Tzer, [is] in the potter's כֵּן־ <S%H3651><s%> ken- so אַתֶּ֥ם <S%H859><s%> 'at-Tem in בְּיָדִ֖י <S%H3027><s%> be-ya-Di so [are] ye in mine hand בֵּ֥ית <S%H1004><s%> beit O house יִשְׂרָאֵֽל׃ <S%H3478><s%> Yis-ra-'El. of Israel ס sa-Mek

רֶ֣גַע <S%H7281><s%> Re-ga' [At what] instant אֲדַבֵּ֔ר <S%H1696><s%> 'a-dab-Ber, I shall speak עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> 'al- concerning גּ֖וֹי <S%H1471><s%> Goy concerning a nation וְעַל־ <S%H5921><s%> ve-'al- concerning מַמְלָכָ֑ה <S%H4467><s%> mam-la-Chah; and concerning a kingdom לִנְת֥וֹשׁ <S%H5428><s%> lin-Toosh to pluck up וְלִנְת֖וֹץ <S%H5422><s%> ve-lin-Totz and to pull down וּֽלְהַאֲבִֽיד׃ <S%H6><s%> U-le-ha-'a-Vid. and to destroy

וְשָׁב֙ <S%H7725><s%> ve-Shav turn הַגּ֣וֹי <S%H1471><s%> hag-Goy If that nation הַה֔וּא <S%H1931><s%> ha-Hu, he מֵרָ֣עָת֔וֹ <S%H7451><s%> me-Ra-'a-To, from their evil אֲשֶׁ֥ר <S%H834><s%> 'a-Sher which דִּבַּ֖רְתִּי <S%H1696><s%> dib-Bar-ti against whom I have pronounced עָלָ֑יו <S%H5921><s%> 'a-Lav; against וְנִֽחַמְתִּי֙ <S%H5162><s%> ve-ni-cham-Ti I will repent עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> 'al- concerning הָ֣רָעָ֔ה <S%H7451><s%> ha-ra-'Ah, of the evil אֲשֶׁ֥ר <S%H834><s%> 'a-Sher which חָשַׁ֖בְתִּי <S%H2803><s%> cha-Shav-ti that I thought לַעֲשׂ֥וֹת <S%H6213><s%> la-'a-Sot to do לֽוֹ׃ lo. ס sa-Mek

וְרֶ֣גַע <S%H7281><s%> ve-Re-ga' And [at what] instant אֲדַבֵּ֔ר <S%H1696><s%> 'a-dab-Ber, I shall speak עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> 'al- concerning גּ֖וֹי <S%H1471><s%> Goy concerning a nation וְעַל־ <S%H5921><s%> ve-'al- concerning מַמְלָכָ֑ה <S%H4467><s%> mam-la-Chah; and concerning a kingdom לִבְנֹ֖ת <S%H1129><s%> liv-Not to build וְלִנְטֹֽעַ׃ <S%H5193><s%> ve-lin-To-a'. and to plant

וְעָשָׂ֤ה <S%H6213><s%> ve-'a-Sah If it do; הָרָעָה ha-ra-'ah כהָרַע֙ <S%H7451><s%> ha-Ra' adversity קבְּעֵינַ֔י <S%H5869><s%> be-'ei-Nai, in my sight לְבִלְתִּ֖י <S%H1115><s%> le-vil-Ti not שְׁמֹ֣עַ <S%H8085><s%> she-Mo-a' that it obey בְּקוֹלִ֑י <S%H6963><s%> be-ko-Li; not my voice וְנִֽחַמְתִּי֙ <S%H5162><s%> ve-ni-cham-Ti then I will repent עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> 'al- of הַטּוֹבָ֔ה <S%H2896><s%> hat-to-Vah, of the good אֲשֶׁ֥ר <S%H834><s%> 'a-Sher which אָמַ֖רְתִּי <S%H559><s%> 'a-Mar-ti wherewith I said לְהֵיטִ֥יב <S%H3190><s%> le-hei-Tiv I would benefit אוֹתֽוֹ׃ <S%H853><s%> o-To. ס sa-Mek

וְעַתָּ֡ה <S%H6258><s%> ve-'at-Tah now אֱמָר־ <S%H559><s%> 'e-mor- Now therefore go to speak נָ֣א <S%H4994><s%> na Oh אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> 'el- to אִישׁ־ <S%H376><s%> 'ish- to the men יְהוּדָה֩ <S%H3063><s%> ye-hu-Dah of Judah וְעַל־ <S%H5921><s%> ve-'al- and against יוֹשְׁבֵ֨י <S%H3427><s%> yo-she-Vei and to the inhabitants יְרוּשָׁלִַ֜ם <S%H3389><s%> ye-ru-sha-Lim of Jerusalem לֵאמֹ֗ר <S%H559><s%> le-Mor, saying כֹּ֚ה <S%H3541><s%> koh Thus אָמַ֣ר <S%H559><s%> 'a-Mar Thus saith יְהוָ֔ה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh, the LORD הִנֵּ֨ה <S%H2009><s%> hin-Neh Behold אָנֹכִ֜י <S%H595><s%> 'a-no-Chi I יוֹצֵ֤ר <S%H3335><s%> yo-Tzer Behold I frame עֲלֵיכֶם֙ <S%H5921><s%> 'a-lei-Chem against רָעָ֔ה <S%H7451><s%> ra-'Ah, evil וְחֹשֵׁ֥ב <S%H2803><s%> ve-cho-Shev against you and devise עֲלֵיכֶ֖ם <S%H5921><s%> 'a-lei-Chem against מַֽחֲשָׁבָ֑ה <S%H4284><s%> ma-cha-sha-Vah; a device שׁ֣וּבוּ <S%H7725><s%> Shu-vu against you return נָ֗א <S%H4994><s%> Na, Oh אִ֚ישׁ <S%H376><s%> 'ish ye now every one מִדַּרְכּ֣וֹ <S%H1870><s%> mid-dar-Ko way הָֽרָעָ֔ה <S%H7451><s%> ha-ra-'Ah, from his evil וְהֵיטִ֥יבוּ <S%H3190><s%> ve-hei-Ti-vu good דַרְכֵיכֶ֖ם <S%H1870><s%> dar-chei-Chem and make your ways וּמַעַלְלֵיכֶֽם׃ <S%H4611><s%> u-ma-'al-lei-Chem. and your doings

וְאָמְר֖וּ <S%H559><s%> ve-'a-me-Ru And they said נוֹאָ֑שׁ <S%H2976><s%> no-'Ash; There is no hope כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> ki- for אַחֲרֵ֤י <S%H310><s%> 'a-cha-Rei after מַחְשְׁבוֹתֵ֙ינוּ֙ <S%H4284><s%> mach-she-vo-Tei-nu our own devices נֵלֵ֔ךְ <S%H1980><s%> ne-Lech, are going וְאִ֛ישׁ <S%H376><s%> ve-'Ish and we will every one שְׁרִר֥וּת <S%H8307><s%> she-ri-Rut the imagination לִבּֽוֹ־ <S%H3820><s%> lib-bov- heart הָרָ֖ע <S%H7451><s%> ha-Ra' of his evil נַעֲשֶֽׂה׃ <S%H6213><s%> na-'a-Seh. do ס sa-Mek

לָכֵ֗ן <S%H3651><s%> la-Chen, Therefore כֹּ֚ה <S%H3541><s%> koh thus אָמַ֣ר <S%H559><s%> 'a-Mar Therefore thus saith יְהוָ֔ה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh, the LORD שַֽׁאֲלוּ־ <S%H7592><s%> sha-'a-lu- Ask נָא֙ <S%H4994><s%> na now בַּגּוֹיִ֔ם <S%H1471><s%> bag-go-Yim, ye now among the heathen מִ֥י <S%H4310><s%> mi Who שָׁמַ֖ע <S%H8085><s%> sha-Ma' who hath heard כָּאֵ֑לֶּה <S%H428><s%> ka-'El-leh; another שַֽׁעֲרֻרִת֙ <S%H8186><s%> sha-'a-ru-Rit horrible thing עָשְׂתָ֣ה <S%H6213><s%> 'a-se-Tah hath done מְאֹ֔ד <S%H3966><s%> me-'Od, a very בְּתוּלַ֖ת <S%H1330><s%> be-tu-Lat such things the virgin יִשְׂרָאֵֽל׃ <S%H3478><s%> Yis-ra-'El. of Israel

הֲיַעֲזֹ֥ב <S%H5800><s%> ha-ya-'a-Zo Will [a man] leave מִצּ֛וּר <S%H6697><s%> mitz-Tzur [which cometh] from the rock שָׂדַ֖י <S%H7704><s%> sa-Dai country שֶׁ֣לֶג <S%H7950><s%> She-leg the snow לְבָנ֑וֹן <S%H3844><s%> le-va-Non; of Lebanon אִם־ <S%H518><s%> 'im- ever יִנָּתְשׁ֗וּ <S%H5428><s%> yin-na-te-Shu, be forsaken מַ֛יִם <S%H4325><s%> Ma-yim waters זָרִ֥ים <S%H2114><s%> za-Rim that come from another place קָרִ֖ים <S%H7119><s%> ka-Rim is the cold נוֹזְלִֽים׃ <S%H5140><s%> noz-Lim. flowing

כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> ki- for שְׁכֵחֻ֥נִי <S%H7911><s%> she-che-Chu-ni hath forgotten עַמִּ֖י <S%H5971><s%> 'am-Mi Because my people לַשָּׁ֣וְא <S%H7723><s%> lash-Shav to vanity יְקַטֵּ֑רוּ <S%H6999><s%> ye-kat-Te-ru; me they have burned incense וַיַּכְשִׁל֤וּם <S%H3782><s%> vai-yach-shi-Lum and they have caused them to stumble בְּדַרְכֵיהֶם֙ <S%H1870><s%> be-dar-chei-Hem in their ways שְׁבִילֵ֣י <S%H7635><s%> she-vi-Lei paths עוֹלָ֔ם <S%H5769><s%> o-Lam, [from] the ancient לָלֶ֣כֶת <S%H1980><s%> la-Le-chet to walk נְתִיב֔וֹת <S%H5410><s%> ne-ti-Vot, in paths דֶּ֖רֶךְ <S%H1870><s%> De-rech [in] a way לֹ֥א <S%H3808><s%> lo cast סְלוּלָֽה׃ <S%H5549><s%> se-lu-Lah. not cast up

לָשׂ֥וּם <S%H7760><s%> la-Sum To make אַרְצָ֛ם <S%H776><s%> 'ar-Tzam their land לְשַׁמָּ֖ה <S%H8047><s%> le-sham-Mah desolate; שְׁרוּקַת she-ru-kat כשְׁרִיקֹ֣ות <S%H8292><s%> she-ri-Kot bleating קעוֹלָ֑ם <S%H5769><s%> o-Lam; [and] a perpetual כֹּ֚ל <S%H3605><s%> kol Everyone עוֹבֵ֣ר <S%H5674><s%> o-Ver every one that passeth עָלֶ֔יהָ <S%H5921><s%> 'a-Lei-ha, and יִשֹּׁ֖ם <S%H8074><s%> yish-Shom thereby shall be astonished וְיָנִ֥יד <S%H5110><s%> ve-ya-Nid and wag בְּרֹאשֽׁוֹ׃ <S%H7218><s%> be-ro-Sho. his head

כְּרֽוּחַ־ <S%H7307><s%> ke-Ru-ach- wind קָדִ֥ים <S%H6921><s%> ka-Dim them as with an east אֲפִיצֵ֖ם <S%H6327><s%> 'a-fi-Tzem I will scatter לִפְנֵ֣י <S%H6440><s%> lif-Nei before אוֹיֵ֑ב <S%H341><s%> o-Yev; the enemy עֹ֧רֶף <S%H6203><s%> 'O-ref them the back וְלֹֽא־ <S%H3808><s%> ve-lo- not פָנִ֛ים <S%H6440><s%> fa-Nim and not the face אֶרְאֵ֖ם <S%H7200><s%> 'er-'Em I will shew בְּי֥וֹם <S%H3117><s%> be-Yom in the day אֵידָֽם׃ <S%H343><s%> 'ei-Dam. of their calamity ס sa-Mek

וַיֹּאמְר֗וּ <S%H559><s%> vai-yo-me-Ru, Then said לְכ֨וּ <S%H1980><s%> le-Chu Come וְנַחְשְׁבָ֣ה <S%H2803><s%> ve-nach-she-Vah and let us devise עַֽל־ <S%H5921><s%> 'al- against יִרְמְיָהוּ֮ <S%H3414><s%> yir-me-ya-Hu against Jeremiah מַחֲשָׁבוֹת֒ <S%H4284><s%> ma-cha-sha-Vot devices כִּי֩ <S%H3588><s%> ki Surely לֹא־ <S%H3808><s%> lo- nor תֹאבַ֨ד <S%H6><s%> to-Vad shall not perish תּוֹרָ֜ה <S%H8451><s%> to-Rah for the law מִכֹּהֵ֗ן <S%H3548><s%> mik-ko-Hen, from the priest וְעֵצָה֙ <S%H6098><s%> ve-'e-Tzah nor counsel מֵֽחָכָ֔ם <S%H2450><s%> me-cha-Cham, from the wise וְדָבָ֖ר <S%H1697><s%> ve-da-Var nor the word מִנָּבִ֑יא <S%H5030><s%> min-na-Vi; from the prophet לְכוּ֙ <S%H1980><s%> le-Chu Come וְנַכֵּ֣הוּ <S%H5221><s%> ve-nak-Ke-hu and let us smite בַלָּשׁ֔וֹן <S%H3956><s%> val-la-Shon, him with the tongue וְאַל־ <S%H408><s%> ve-'al- no נַקְשִׁ֖יבָה <S%H7181><s%> nak-Shi-vah and let us not give heed אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> 'el- to כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> kol- any דְּבָרָֽיו׃ <S%H1697><s%> de-va-Rav. to any of his words
